title: Libidacoria: IN A PLAIN BROWN WRAPPER
description: Libidacoria chronicles the author's sexual journey from using men to satisfy her own "beast" to finding that one special man who obsesses her and ultimately opens her up for the possibility of love again. Her graphic use of language and raw directness are intermingled with a subtle desire for romance and connectivity giving this book a unique insight into the feminine psyche. Libidacoria paves the way to her upcoming second release, Keys. Keys will chronicle the author's journey to find love.
author: Kristie LeVangie
